item.title: Flood alert: Upper Bristol Avon area
item.description: River levels are stable at the Fosseway and Great Somerford gauges. Flooding is forecast to affect locations near the Bristol Avon, Tetbury Avon, Sherston Avon, Dauntsey Brook, with low lying land and roads expected to be most affected, particularly in Tetbury, Badminton, Brook End at Luckington, Corsham, Lacock and the road at Reybridge. Further rain is forecast Monday and Tuesday. River levels are expected to rise further in response to this rain. We are closely monitoring the situation . Take care and avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water . Avoid using low lying footpaths and any bridges near local watercourses. This message will be updated by 12:00PM on 26 January 2026 or as the situation changes.

item.title: Flood alert: River Wye in Herefordshire
item.description:
